name: 561483-ITP-010 - Electrical Installation, Generator Changeover & Switchboard installation
3.1 - Inspection of Generator Changeover Switch Cabinet
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Check overall condition. check connections for internal electrical components
Acceptance Criteria - Visual check and report any defects or areas of concern
Verifying Document - Email or NTE to report
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Check overall condition. check connections for internal electrical components
Acceptance Criteria - Visual check and report any defects or areas of concern
Verifying Document - Email or NTE to report
3.3 - Delivery of Generator Changeover Switch Cabinet to Site
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Check and verify that the Generator Changeover Switch Cabinet has been delivered damage free
Acceptance Criteria - Cabinet is damage free
Verifying Document - Switchboard Builder Delivery Docket
3.4 - Delivery of Generator Connection Cabinet to site
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Check and verify that the Generator Connection Cabinet has been delivered damage free
Acceptance Criteria - Cabinet is damage free
Verifying Document - Switchboard Builder Delivery Docket
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Check overall condition. check connections for internal electrical components
Acceptance Criteria - Visual check and report any defects or areas of concern
Verifying Document - Email or NTE to report
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Check and verify that the Switchboard has been delivered damage free
Acceptance Criteria - Switchboard is damage free
Verifying Document - Switchboard Builder Delivery Docket
4.1 - Mount Support Brackets To Hand rails for Cabinet
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Support Brackets mounted to Handrail
Acceptance Criteria - Mounts are secure and firm, with no excessive deflection
4.2 - Mount Generator Change over Cabinet to Mounts.
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Cabinet Mounted
Acceptance Criteria - Cabinet is mounted securely, all bolts tight, seals intact and in good condition
4.3 - Mount Generator Connection Cabinet on outside of Building
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Cabinet Mounted
Acceptance Criteria - Cabinet Mounted Securely to wall
4.4 - Install Cable Supports for generator Change over
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Cable ladder installed securely, with adequately spaced supports.
Acceptance Criteria - Cable ladder mounted correctly.
4.5 - Mount Generator Connection Cabinet on outside of Building
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Cabinet Mounted
Acceptance Criteria - Cabinet Mounted Securely to wall
4.6 - Install Cable Supports for generator Change over Cabling
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Cable ladder installed securely, with adequately spaced supports.
Acceptance Criteria - Cable ladder mounted correctly.
4.7 - Install Cabling Between Generator Connection Cabinet and Generator Change over Cabinet
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Cabling installed, secured to support systems, no excessively tight bends on cables.
Acceptance Criteria - Cables adequately Secured, Cable Ties cut off clean with no sharp edges.
4.8 - Terminate cables into Generator Connection Cabinet
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Cables fit off into cabinet.
Acceptance Criteria - Cables enter into Enclosure through appropriately sized glands, cables fit off correctly and terminated
4.9 - Isolate Supply to Pump Station at WTP Switchboard.
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Supply isolated
Acceptance Criteria - power to Pump Station isolated, no voltage/ current present on cables
4.10 - Disconnect Mains Supply from Pump Station Switchboard and relocated to Changeover Cabinet
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Cables disconnected and routed to changeover enclosure
Acceptance Criteria - Cables clearly identified for origin/phase.
4.11 - Terminate cables into Generator Changeover Cabinet
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Cables fit off into cabinet.
Acceptance Criteria - Cables enter into Enclosure through appropriately sized glands, cables fit off correctly and terminated to correct terminals on Changeover Switch.
4.12 - Install New Cables Between Changeover Switch And Switchboard
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Cables installed and secured to existing cable trays
Acceptance Criteria - Cables are correctly sized, secured adequately to cable trays.
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Cables fit off into Switchboard and Generator Changeover.
Acceptance Criteria - Cables enter into Enclosures through appropriately sized glands, cables fit off correctly and terminated
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Cabinet Mounted
Acceptance Criteria - Cabinet is mounted securely, all bolts tight, seals intact and in good condition
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Cables fit off into cabinet.
Acceptance Criteria - Cables enter into Enclosure through appropriately sized glands, cables fit off correctly and terminated
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - New Cables installed, insulation, continuity and polarity tests completed, phase rotation confirmed
Acceptance Criteria - Electrical Testing completed, board Livened and operating as prior to modification.
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Cabling installed and terminated. changeover tested and inability for back feeding of supply confirmed.
Acceptance Criteria - Changeover operation Verified as satisfactory. unable to live test due to lack of a suitably sized Generator
Verifying Document - Cable/Cabinet ITR's, COC, ROI From Inspector
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Generator Connection Cabinet mounted, cabling fit off, testing completed.
Acceptance Criteria - Cabinet Mounted Securely, polarity of connections correct,
